page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: the area is{Gibbings Ltd,}situated along Leigh Rd who are the main 'Zetor and New Holland distribuors and employ 14.{Derryrose Ltd Dolls Factory}employ 20 local girls in the factory at Beacon Rise along with 300 outworkers covering Barnstaple, Bideford, Exeter, and Tiverton. They print on leather; make silk and lace bags for Yardleys; PVC bags and powder puffs for Marks & Spencers, Boots, C&A etc. They make, paint, dress and pack dolls; sold to major outlets, some exported. {Littlejohns Garage}was initially, a hundred years ago, a blacksmiths shop when Joshua started a bicycle business. With the help of his son Caleb this became a motorcycle and car sales and maintenance shop. Caleb's son, Norman has just died. With the Leyland franchise employs 8.{Turners {Tours Ltd}with some 15 buses and two
